document_data.name: Bastun
document_data.Appearance: Bastun wore a dark mask of wood inlaid with silver whorls and tiny designs resembling thorny vines that covered his face from forehead to jawline. He wore robes.
document_data.Equipment: Bastun's mask was enchanted to enhance his hearing.
document_data.History: Bastun was taught and inducted into the brotherhood of the [[vremyonni]] by [[Keffrass]] shortly after being suspected of tempting his sister to enter the [[Urlingwood]], which was a capital offense in Rashemen. Bastun studied under Keffrass, who awakened a love of knowledge in him. He was later suspected in the murder of Keffrass and was given the choice of exile or death; he chose exile and, in doing so, found out who was responsible for his master's death.
